body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack info warpx
# ...
Variants:
    Name [Default]      Allowed values       Description
    ================    =================    ==============================

    ascent [off]        True, False          Enable Ascent in situ vis
    backend [openmp]    openmp, cuda, hip    Programming model for compute
                                             kernels
    debug [off]         True, False          Enable debugging features
    dims [3]            2, 3, rz             Number of spatial dimensions
    mpi [on]            True, False          Enable MPI support
    openpmd [on]        True, False          Enable openPMD I/O
    psatd [off]         True, False          Enable PSATD solver
    tprof [on]          True, False          Enable tiny profiling features
```

### What's off?

The `[Default]` values for boolean switches `on`/`off` to not match the allowed values `True`/`False`. This discrepancy might confuse users.
title: Spack Info: Default "Bool" Switch Strings
